What if a 🐀, who was so sniveling that it became a toady, was taunted by a 🐜 who was so decisive that it became a decision maker?
The 🐀's detractors were now forming a queue. #Toady=#Decision_maker
🐀😖👈😄🐜 (or: 🐀 was taunted by 🐜) So at first, the decisive 🐜 taunted the sniveling 🐀 with cruel jibes.
🐀👅🆙🐜 (or: 🐀 licked up to 🐜) So the 🐀 licked up to the 🐜. 🐜🖕➡🐀🙂☹ (or: 🐀 was disrespected by 🐜) But the 🐜 spat in the 🐀's eye.
🐀💵➡🐜 (or: 🐀 paid off 🐜) So the 🐀 paid the 🐜 to do its bidding.
🐀🆚👤❓🐀👈🐜 (or: 🐀 was favored by 🐜) Well, the 🐜 openly favored the 🐀.
🐀🤔💬🆚🗨🤔🐜 (or: 🐀 disagreed with 🐜) Yet the 🐀 expressed strong disagreement with the 🐜.
🐀😖🔚󱕴🗨🐜 (or: 🐀 was fired by 🐜) "Get out! You're fired" said the 🐜.
🐀➡🐜💀 (or: 🐀 murdered 🐜) Well, the 🐀 murdered the 🐜 in its bed.
🐀➡🐜💀🔚🚔🔗 (or: 🐀 was arrested for killing 🐜) So in the end the sniveling 🐀 was arrested for brutally attacking the decisive 🐜.
The 🐜 died soon after and the 🐀 was charged with murder. The End
